I'll take a step-by-step look at the board and our options. Currently our snake’s head is at (1,3) with our body immediately above at (1,4). We just ate an apple by moving DOWN last turn, so our new board no longer has that apple.

• (4,5): 3 + 2 = 5

• (7,3): 6 + 0 = 6  
• (0,0): 1 + 3 = 4

– UP would reverse into our own body at (1,4), which is not allowed.

– LEFT → (0,3) is also safe and has the advantage of aligning us directly above (0,0).

Since moving LEFT places us in the 0th column, we could then continue downward directly to reach the apple at (0,0) in three moves (from (0,3) to (0,2), then (0,1), and finally (0,0)). There aren’t any obstacles in that column, and the enemy snake at (8,0) is far off.

Thus, my strategy is to steer toward the apple at (0,0) by moving LEFT now. 

Next move: LEFT.
